# Release M3.2 â€“ Progressive UI enhancements, audits, test fixes, and docs

Tag: m3.2
Date: 2025-09-27

## Highlights

- Progressive UI enhancements (opt-in) with localStorage persistence and i18n labels (en/es)
- Enhancement styles scoped under `body.enhanced` to preserve standard mode
- Web audit: `UI_MODE` awareness and `uiMode` recorded in summaries
- Cross-platform `web-audit:enhanced` alias via wrapper script
- PowerShell deterministic test fix to parse non-2xx JSON bodies (402)
- Documentation: README updates and new guides (ui-guide, accessibility, responsive); Spec Kit docs refreshed (spec/plan/tasks/constitution)

## Breaking changes

- None

## Upgrade notes

- No migration needed. Standard mode remains default; enhanced mode is opt-in via the UI toggle or localStorage.
